Test Name: Coxiella burnetii (Q Fever) Molecular Detection, PCR
Specimen Type: Whole blood, serum, tissue, and other body fluids
Purpose: To detect Coxiella burnetii DNA in clinical specimens using PCR for accurate and reliable diagnosis of Q fever.
Equipment: PCR Workstation; Microcentrifuge; PCR Thermocycler; Real-Time PCR Detection System; Nucleic Acid Extraction Kits
